subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Hélio Castroneves won for the first time in 30 races, keeping alive his hope of a IndyCar Series title with a victory at the Grand Prix of Sonoma County in Sonoma, Calif. Scott Dixon, who finished 12th, saw his lead in the standings shrink to 43 points with two races to go.
